articles.author: Russell Chattaraj
articles.title: Frozen History: Traces of the World's Oldest Glaciers Discovered in South Africa - Transcontinental Times
articles.description: SOUTH AFRICA: In a groundbreaking discovery, scientists have unearthed traces of the world’s oldest known glaciers, dating back a staggering 2.9 billion years, within rocks beneath South Africa’s abundant gold deposits.  These findings provide compelling evid…
